statements: SELECT * FROM network_data;
SELECT id, timestamp FROM network_data WHERE latency > 50;
SELECT * FROM network_data WHERE packet_loss < 0.1 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT id, latency, packet_loss FROM network_data WHERE latency < 20 AND packet_loss < 0.05;
SELECT id, timestamp, latency, packet_loss FROM network_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT id, timestamp, latency, packet_loss FROM network_data WHERE latency > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM network_data WHERE packet_loss < 5 AND latency > 20 ORDER BY packet_loss ASC, latency DESC
SELECT * FROM network_data WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND packet_loss < 2.5 ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT id, timestamp, latency FROM network_data WHERE packet_loss BETWEEN 2.5 AND 5 ORDER BY latency DESC
SELECT id, timestamp, packet_loss FROM network_data WHERE packet_loss = 0.0 ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT * FROM network_latency ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT latency_id, timestamp, latency_ms FROM network_latency WHERE latency_ms > 50;
SELECT loss_id, loss_percentage FROM packet_loss WHERE loss_percentage < 5 ORDER BY loss_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM network_latency JOIN packet_loss ON network_latency.latency_id = packet_loss.loss_id;
SELECT MAX(latency_ms) AS max_latency FROM network_latency;
SELECT latency_id, timestamp, latency_ms FROM network_latency WHERE latency_id = 1;
SELECT loss_id, timestamp, loss_percentage FROM packet_loss WHERE loss_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT latency_id, timestamp, latency_ms FROM network_latency WHERE latency_ms > 50 AND timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM packet_loss WHERE loss_percentage BETWEEN 0.1 AND 1.0;
SELECT AVG(latency_ms) AS avg_latency FROM network_latency;
SELECT * FROM network_latency_data LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, timestamp, latency_ms FROM network_latency_data WHERE latency_ms > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM connectivity_summary WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY total_latency_ms ASC;
SELECT issue_id, resolution, resolved_by FROM issue_resolution WHERE resolved_by = 'John Doe';
SELECT id, timestamp, packet_loss_pct FROM network_latency_data WHERE packet_loss_pct >= 5 ORDER BY id;
SELECT * FROM network_latency_data WHERE latency_ms > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, timestamp, latency_ms FROM network_latency_data WHERE packet_loss_pct < 5.0 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT MIN(latency_ms) AS min_latency, MAX(latency_ms) AS max_latency FROM network_latency_data;
SELECT * FROM connectivity_summary WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY total_latency_ms DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT resolution, COUNT(*) AS total_resolutions FROM issue_resolution GROUP BY resolution HAVING total_resolutions > 1 ORDER BY total_resolutions DESC;
SELECT * FROM network_latency_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT device_name, location FROM device_data WHERE device_type = 'Router'
SELECT description, severity FROM connectivity_issues WHERE severity = 'Critical'
SELECT issue_id, resolution FROM resolved_issues ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT * FROM network_latency_data WHERE latency_ms > 50
SELECT * FROM network_latency_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_type, location FROM device_data WHERE device_type='Router';
SELECT id, timestamp, latency_ms FROM network_latency_data WHERE latency_ms > 50 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM resolved_issues WHERE resolution IS NOT NULL AND resolved_by='Admin' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, issue_id, description, severity FROM connectivity_issues WHERE severity='High' ORDER BY id;
SELECT * FROM network_latency_data ORDER BY latency_ms DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, timestamp, source_ip FROM network_latency_data WHERE latency_ms > 50
SELECT DISTINCT(destination_ip) FROM network_latency_data
SELECT source_ip, AVG(latency_ms) AS avg_latency FROM network_latency_data GROUP BY source_ip
SELECT * FROM network_devices WHERE location='Data Center'
SELECT * FROM network_latency_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip, latency_ms FROM network_latency_data WHERE latency_ms > 50 ORDER BY latency_ms DESC;
SELECT issue_type, description FROM connectivity_issues WHERE issue_type = 'Connection Timeout' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM resolved_issues WHERE resolution_time >= '2022-01-01' AND resolution_details LIKE '%resolved%' ORDER BY resolution_time ASC;
SELECT engineer_name, expertise_area FROM network_engineers WHERE expertise_area IN ('Network Security', 'Network Optimization') ORDER BY engineer_name;
